{"step_by_step_thinking": "Hemodialysis-associated amyloidosis is a condition where amyloid proteins deposit in various tissues due to chronic inflammation and long-term hemodialysis. The most common type of amyloid protein found in hemodialysis-associated amyloidosis is beta-2 microglobulin (b-2 microglobulin). Therefore, the answer is C. b-2 microglobulin.", "answer_choice": "C"}
